overview: Just as strongly as the universe is occupied by the dark matter that surrounds and enshrouds our worlds, there is the irredeemably beautiful glow of the endless stars and galaxies ceaselessly glimmering, even past their own lifespans. A joyful exploration of how light and sound can delight and entrance the eyes and ears to allow the viewers’ minds to bask in the absurdity of watching two aliens’ creative teamwork going completely awry.
title: Mix
